pkgmetadata.longdescription: Binary alignment (BAM), FASTA, variant call (BCF), and tabix file import // This package provides an interface to the 'samtools', 'bcftools', and 'tabix' utilities (see 'LICENCE') for manipulating SAM (Sequence Alignment / Map), FASTA, binary variant call (BCF) and compressed indexed tab-delimited (tabix) files.
